tool_description: Tracks and manages shopping cart states across user sessions, capturing cart modifications, item additions/removals, and session continuity.

cart_action.description: Action performed: add_item, remove_item, update_quantity, view_cart, proceed_checkout

error_messages: Invalid user_id: User ID must be a non-empty string
Invalid session_id: Session ID must be a non-empty string
Invalid cart_action: Must be one of [add_item, remove_item, update_quantity, view_cart, proceed_checkout]
Invalid timestamp: Must be a valid ISO 8601 date-time string
usage: Call this tool whenever a user performs any cart-related action. Provide the user_id, session_id, specific cart_action, and timestamp to track cart state changes.

cart_state.description: Current state of the cart: active, modified, abandoned, or checkout_initiated

last_activity.description: Timestamp of the last cart activity
